description:
http://KEXP.ORG presents Quivers performing live in the KEXP studio. Recorded July 30, 2024.

Songs:
Pink Smoke 00:28
Never Be Lonely 06:02
Apparition 13:52
Gutters Of Love 19:55

Sam Nicholson - Vocals, Guitar
Bella Quinlan - Vocals, Bass
Holly Thomas - Vocal, Drums
Michael Panton - Guitar, Vocal

Host: John Richards
Audio Engineer: Kevin Suggs
Mastering Engineer: Matt Ogaz

Cameras: Jim Beckmann, Carlos Cruz, Scott Holpainen & Luke Knecht
Editor: Scott Holpainen

https://www.quiversmusic.com
http://kexp.org

title: Quivers - Full Performance (Live on KEXP)
